answers.answer: It's spelled diabetes not 'diatetes'. Are you or your sons mother diabetics or have family histories of diabetes, the reason why you're testing his glucose levels? The postprandial level is acceptable but not the other mentions. Call your sons Pediatrician for an evaluation. Good luck

question: is he diatetes?  my three old boy blood sugar is 5.8 two hours after eating is this good or bad? he is always drinks away and not eating much and going to toilet a lot.
title: Diatetes
